thread.title: Emily Blunt Dishes About Ex, Michael Buble & Addresses Those Cheating Rumours
thread.title_full: Emily Blunt Dishes About Ex, Michael Buble & Addresses Those Cheating Rumours

title: Emily Blunt Dishes About Ex, Michael Buble & Addresses Those Cheating Rumours
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
'Sicario' actress Emily Blunt opened up about her ex boyfriend, Michael Buble with Howard Stern at his SiriusXM radio show. 
Emily Blunt and Michael Buble dated from 2005-2008 and now after so many years, the actress addressed those cheating rumours which were somewhere stated as one of the main reasons behind her split with Michael. 
Emily Blunt who is now married to John Krasinski, was asked by Howard Stern about the cheating rumours and that he was unfaithful. She replied , "I don't know. It's complicated. Now I'm going red because I never talk about it. I never want to talk about it."" 
She added, "You're like the great seductor. I can't do it." 
Image Courtesy of Twitter 
However, she revealed that she had a great time with her ex boyfriend and she loves his family. "I don't know if I was perfect with him," she shared on the show. "But we had a good time." 
"I loved his family... I love his family. I still do," Blunt said after the Howard Stern recalled how the 40-year-old singer brought her back to Canada to meet his mother, Amber. 
Life has certainly moved on since the high-profile romance. Emily got married to The Office star, John Krasinski in 2010. They share 19-month-old daughter Hazel together. 
Michael Buble too got hitched to Luisana Lopilato and they have a two-year-old son together, Noah. Lopilato is currently expecting baby no 2.
